fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Every non full moon night, look over a player. You will astrally see all actions taken on that player, including true killers (if the kill is disguised)
Every full moon night, you may visit another player to provide support. This is effectively a bodyguard protection.

fields.name: Hunting Moon Enchancement:
fields.value:
**Feathers Kept**
Everyone you previously protected is dealt a basic attack, unless they are a were. Your protection becomes astral, and your attack upgrades itself to powerful.
